name: root
description: The monorepo for the web-based strategy game cellscript.io
author: Tyler Hurson

scripts.build: yarn lerna bootstrap && yarn lerna run build
scripts.clean: yarn lerna clean --yes && yarn lerna run clean --parallel
scripts.init: npm install --global yarn && yarn global add lerna@4.0.0 && lerna bootstrap
scripts.reset: yarn run clean && rimraf yarn.lock && rimraf package-lock.json && rimraf node_modules
